snippet: During the Rwandan genocide, Epiphanie Musabiyemaria was targeted for death. Brought to safety in the United States, she refused to become a victim.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York helps Epiphanie Musabiyemari of Poughkeepsie, Rwandan refugee and viction of domestic violence, pay for application fee for green card under the Violence Against Women Act.
lead_paragraph: During the Rwandan genocide, Epiphanie Musabiyemaria was targeted for death. Brought to safety in the United States, she refused to become a victim.

headline.print_headline: After Escaping Slaughter, A Deep Instinct to Survive
headline.main: After Escaping Slaughter in Rwanda, a Deep Instinct to Survive
